ResearchProjectDef.label: ultra parts

ResearchProjectDef.label: core assistants
ResearchProjectDef.description: Create advanced chips that can greatly enhance individual aspects of a synstruct.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText: Core Assistants are powerful implants that can be installed into any non-biomimetic synstruct to enhance their capabilities. Create them at a parts workbench, and install them using repair stims. Due to limited space in the core, each synstruct may have exactly one core assistant at a time. This enhancement will be lost if the pawn dies due to their core being destroyed.
